title: Ferrari 296 GTS Review; Nikola CEO Guilty; Countach surgery; Q&A
description:
Zack gives us his take on the Ferrari 296 GTS; Matt's Countach goes under the knife with surprising results; Nikola's president gets sentenced; How to buy your brother-in-law's car; we recommend the best winter fun car; and more!  
 

Recorded October 17, 2022


 

https://experiences.roadandtrack.com/
